original_title: FM: Back in the Saddle Live
overview: BACK IN THE SADDLE is the live DVD of the greatly anticipated comeback performance by one of Britain’s best loved rock bands - FM.  Filmed during the sold-out Firefest IV in October 2007 at Nottingham Rock City, this DVD is a must-have for any self-respecting FM fanatic.
tagline: If you were lucky enough to be there, re-live this magical October night.  If you couldn’t make it, be sure to savour the spellbinding performances of Steve Overland, Merv Goldsworthy, Pete Jupp, Andy Barnett and Jem Davis as the mighty FM return to the stage.
title: FM: Back in the Saddle Live
